title: Cobbogoth
description: Norah Lukens needs to uncover the truth about the fabled lost city of Cobbogoth. After her archaeologist uncleâ€™s murder, Norah is asked to translate his old research journal for evidence and discovers that his murder was a cover-up for something far more sinister. Readers of all ages will be captivated by this tale of mythical beings, elemental magic, and the secrets of a lost city.
author: Hannah L. Clark
